title: Biden Sees Top Foes Join Forces in North Korea, Iran Sending Arms to Russia

title: Why Madonna Is the 'Villain' of Weird Al Yankovic Biopic
description: Speaking with Newsweek, actor Evan Rachel Wood said the pop icon was "just running circles around everybody."
content:
It seems that Evan Rachel Wood had fun playing Madonna in Weird: The Al Yankovic Story, describing her own performance as the "mustache-twirling version" of the larger-than-life pop icon.

title: Eva Green: James Bond Producer Will 'Make the Right Choice' for Future
description: Actor Eva Green spoke with Newsweek about her character in the 2006 film "Casino Royale," and why Vesper Lynd still haunts James Bond in recent films.
content:
Eva Green played Vesper Lynd in the James Bond film Casino Royale in 2006, and though she only appeared in the one film, Green said she is confident that the future of the series remains in good hands.

title: Without Trump, Democrats and Republicans Struggle to Maintain Enthusiasm
description: "Politics is just different without Trump being center stage," Gallup's director of U.S. social research told Newsweek.
content:
Voter enthusiasm is down compared to the 2018 midterm elections, and former President Donald Trump may be the reason Democrats and Republicans are struggling to engage the electorate.

title: Comedian Weighs In on Consequences of Joke Stealing Amid James Corden Drama
description: Veteran comedy writer Jeffrey L. Gurian spoke to Newsweek about having one of his own jokes stolen, and discusses the incident between Corden and Ricky Gervais.
content:
If a writer at The Late Late Show intentionally gave James Corden Ricky Gervais' joke, he'd be fired and "blackballed" according to comedian Jeffrey L. Gurian.

title: Woman Turns Up To Surprise Wedding Wearing Incredible Halloween Costume
description: Newsweek spoke to the Reddit user who said: "It was the most fun and silliest wedding ever."
content:
A woman who turned up to a surprise wedding dressed up in a hilarious Halloween costume has gone viral.
